title: Understanding the Table
text: Look at the cumulative relative frequency column. It shows the percentage of data points that fall below the upper boundary of each interval.

title: Identify the Relevant Interval
text: Find the cumulative relative frequency for the interval just below $$9.01$$ inches.

title: Calculate the Percentage
text: The cumulative relative frequency for rainfall less than $$9.01$$ inches is $$0.56$$. Convert this to a percentage.
